original_title: 戦慄怪奇ファイル 超コワすぎ！ FILE-01 恐怖降臨！コックリさん
overview: Based on the previous 'Final Chapter', world history has now been modified and reconstructed. Although Kudo was able to release himself from the curse caused by demon soldiers, he now has no money. Despite losing the memory of the previous world, Kudo, Ichikawa and Tashiro continue to work together in producing a horror documentary.
title: Senritsu Kaiki File Super Kowa Too! Fear Adventure: Kokkuri-san
